meanings.definition: A type of fish with black fins.
meanings.sent1: The blackfins swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of blackfins while snorkeling.
meanings.sent3: The blackfins decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: The blackfins cut through the water like shadows with their dark fins.
meanings.sent5: The blackfins shimmered under the sunlight, a striking contrast to the blue sea.

meanings.definition: The black fins of a fish.
meanings.sent1: The shiny blackfins of the fish caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: She admired the sleek blackfins of the shark.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the blackfins of the fish in the aquarium.
meanings.sent4: The blackfins of the fish were like elegant flags waving in the water.
meanings.sent5: The blackfins glinted in the dim light, a mysterious sight in the deep sea.
